languages.text: {n}Поздно. Толпа слишком разъярена, чтобы бояться крови. Она жаждет крови, и раненные мной экстатически вопят, прославляя страдание.{/n}
{n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Поздно. Толпа слишком разъярена, чтобы бояться крови. Она жаждет крови, и раненные мной экстатически вопят, прославляя страдание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too furious to fear violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorifying suffering.{/n}
{n}It is too late. The crowd is too furious to fear violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorifying suffering.{/n}
{n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist zu spät. Die Menge ist zu aufgestachelt, um weitere Gewalt zu fürchten. Sie dürstet nach Blut, und wen ich verwunde, der schreit vor Ekstase und genießt sein Leid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist zu spät. Die Menge ist zu aufgestachelt, um weitere Gewalt zu fürchten. Sie dürstet nach Blut, und wen ich verwunde, der schreit vor Ekstase und genießt sein Leid.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es demasiado tarde. La muchedumbre está demasiado enfurecida para temer más violencia. Exige sangre, y aquellos a los que hiero gritan de éxtasis, glorificándose en su agonía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es demasiado tarde. La muchedumbre está demasiado enfurecida para temer más violencia. Exige sangre, y aquellos a los que hiero gritan de éxtasis, glorificándose en su agonía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}時すでに遅し。群衆は異常な興奮状態で、これ以上の暴力を恐れない。群衆は血を求めて、私が攻撃した者たちは恍惚の叫びをあげ、苦痛に誇りを感じている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}時すでに遅し。群衆は異常な興奮状態で、これ以上の暴力を恐れない。群衆は血を求めて、私が攻撃した者たちは恍惚の叫びをあげ、苦痛に誇りを感じている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}已经来不及了。所有人都怒不可遏，不再惧怕任何暴力。人群渴望鲜血，所有被我的利刃划伤的人都狂喜地尖叫起来，以自己的伤口为荣。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}已经来不及了。所有人都怒不可遏，不再惧怕任何暴力。人群渴望鲜血，所有被我的利刃划伤的人都狂喜地尖叫起来，以自己的伤口为荣。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il est trop tard. La foule est trop enragée pour craindre plus de violence. Elle a soif de sang et ceux que je blesse poussent des cris d'extase, savourant leur agonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est trop tard. La foule est trop enragée pour craindre plus de violence. Elle a soif de sang et ceux que je blesse poussent des cris d'extase, savourant leur agonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Artık çok geç. Kalabalık, daha fazla şiddetten korkmayacak kadar öfkeyle dolu. Kana susamışlar. Yaraladıklarım, kendilerinden geçercesine çığlık atıp ızdıraplarıyla mest oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is too late. The crowd is too enraged to fear any more violence. It thirsts for blood, and those I wound scream with ecstasy, glorying in their agony.{/n}
